meanings.definition: Having a sharp, pungent taste or flavor
meanings.sent1: The tangy lemonade made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the tangy kick of salsa on my tacos.
meanings.sent3: The tangy sauce was so zesty, it danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her wit was as tangy as a lemon, always leaving us laughing.
meanings.sent5: The tangy smell of the ocean breeze invigorated me.

meanings.definition: A sharp, pungent taste or flavor
meanings.sent1: The tangy of the pickles added a burst of flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: She loved the tangy of the vinegar in the salad dressing.
meanings.sent3: The tangy of the cheese was so strong, it made her eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The tangy of success lingered in the air after her big win.
meanings.sent5: The tangy of the spices in the curry awakened his senses.
